author.name: Sam Turnbull â€¢ It Doesn't Taste Like Chicken

description: Sweet sticky dates are stuffed with creamy vegan cheese and wrapped in homemade smoky vegan rice paper bacon! Um, yes, please. Vegan Bacon Wrapped Dates are the perfect sweet and salty appetizer that looks and tastes super impressive but it's actually pretty easy to make with just 9 ingredients! The perfect vegan appetizer for your holiday parties and dinner parties.
keywords: bacon, cheese, dates, rice paper, vegan, vegetarian, wrapped
name: Vegan Bacon Wrapped Dates
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup vegan cream cheese ( or salted smoked almonds (see notes for options)
2 tablespoon light oil (such as canola or vegetable)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 400F (200C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
